import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-menu-modal', templateUrl: './menu-modal.component.html', styleUrls: ['./menu-modal.component.scss'], }) export class MenuModalComponent { showModal: boolean = false; onToggleModal() { this.showModal = !this.showModal; } }
